resources.string:
You are at home. It’s safe here. No monsters. Warm blankets.
There are other places if you want to do something more exciting.
Ruin something’s day by going to the forest to hunt it
Go to the shop to buy, sell or upgrade items
Hmm, you are fresh out of pylons.\nNo pylons, no LOUD. It\'s a sad reality.\nYou can either buy some pylons or sell some stuff on the market.

"Welcome to Legend of the Undead Dragon!
 
To play LOUD, you need at least one character.
You can manifest a fresh soul at Pylons Central
or you can head to the market where other players may have one on offer."
Sell 💰 from orderbook / place order to buy 💰
Buy 💰 from orderbook / place order to sell 💰
Sell 🗡️ from orderbook / place order to buy 🗡️
Buy 🗡️ from orderbook / place order to sell 🗡
Sell 🦘 from orderbook / place order to buy 🦘
Buy 🦘 from orderbook / place order to sell 🦘
You can\'t go to forest without character
Turn Pylons into useful things. Like pretend gold. Yes! This is a good use of your valuable Pylons.
It’s a blacksmith’s store.\nThe blacksmith sells things, buys things, and mends things.\nSometimes he regrets his choices in life.
Oh! Here are the dark and spooky woods.\nSomehow everything lives here at the same time. Don’t think about it. Just choose something to pick a fight with.
Your inventory.\nYou can select active character.
Summon a hero. We got a whole lot of chosen ones back here.
You have bought %1$s from Pylons Central
You did fight with %1$s and earned %2$d 💰
You have lost your weapon accidentally
Well that could have gone better. %1$s is dead. Killed by the %2$s. Go back home and pick a new character unless you’re a huge baby.
You don\'t have enough gold to upgrade %1$s
You have upgraded %1$s to get better hunt result

🐇
Not known for putting up much of a fight.
Also typically not very rich. Fuzziness factor, off the charts!
Some rabbits are really super-mean though so be careful!.
👺\nSneaky but weak. You can take him.\nGoblins don\'t have much money but they have a high chance to drop their ear.

🐺
Aroooo! Not as fuzzy as the rabbit, better at biting things too.
Wolves don't have any money so they don't have gold.
But they do have wolf tails. Those might be useful, even if you aren't a wolf
👻\nBig, smelly, and fond of ‘yo mama’ jokes. Don’t say we didn’t warn you.\nTrolls don\'t really drop their toes but they might have a lot of gold because they eat unlucky travellers
🗿\nBigger than the troll, smellier than the troll. Less of a sense of humour than the troll.
🦐\nThe classic fire-breathing dragon. You know the drill. Get at it!
🦈\nIt’s blue, it’s cold, and it’s not your friend.
🐊\nLost its way at a music festival. Colours confuse it. Will melt you and everything you hold dear in a heartbeat.
🐉\nIt looks grumpy but that’s just resting lich face.
Swords are big and clever. Big. And. Clever.
Sell some stuff. Make money, get britches. We’re pretty sure that’s how it works.
No items to sell. Go fight to get some.
Two words. Up. Grade. Make your stuff more awesome.
No items to upgrade. Go buy some!
